Text saved: Asteroids are big rocks in space. Some asteroids can be dangerous to Earth. They are called 'Potentially Hazardous Asteroids' (PHAs). They fly very close to Earth. It can say if a rock is going to hit Earth. If a rock becomes a danger, NASA has two plans to protect us.
